SEARCH
Package Model

Class StartupPhase

java.lang.Object
Model.Phase
Model.StartupPhase
public class StartupPhase extends Phase
Represents the Startup Phase of the game. In this phase, players can perform operations such as loading and editing the map, adding/removing players, assigning countries, and preparing the game for the main loop. Commands like deploy or advance are not valid during this phase.
Author:
Shrey Hingu
